channel.title: The History of the Internet (Part 5) :: Intro CS Textbook
channel.description: YouTube Video Resources Slides Video Script In the previous video we saw mosaic as an example of one of the first web browsers. Itâ€™s really credited with bringing a large number of people to the web because they could easily install it on their personal computers at home. Mosaic was eventually sold to eventually became Netscape Navigator, which was then sold to a new company called Mozilla, and rebranded as Mozilla Firefox.
